long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: malConnect is a chrome extension that provides direct links to watch/read the material on 3rd party sites directly from the MyAnimeList entry page. The extension will query various sites to return links to the source. Since a request is made each time a user views the MyAnimeList entry page, links are always up to date.
